      • onBuild

        protected Dialog onBuild(android.content.Context context,
             int styleId)
        Description copied from class: Dialog.Builder
        Get a appropriate Dialog instance will be used for styling later. Child class should override this function to return appropriate Dialog instance. If you want to apply styling to dialog, or get content view, you should do it in Dialog.Builder.onBuildDone(Dialog)
        Overrides:
        onBuild in class Dialog.Builder
        Parameters:
        context - A Context instance.
        styleId - The resourceId of Dialog's style.
        Returns:
        A Dialog instance will be used for styling later.

        Description copied from interface: SimpleDialog.OnSelectionChangedListener
        Called when the checked state of an item changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface SimpleDialog.OnSelectionChangedListener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of item.
        selected - The checked state.

      • onReadFromParcel

        protected void onReadFromParcel(android.os.Parcel in)
        Description copied from class: Dialog.Builder
        Child class should override this function and read back any saved attributes. All read methods should be called after super.onReadFromParcel() call to keep the order.
        Overrides:
